010package imagingbook.pub.threshold.global;
011
012/**
013 * Thresholder as described in N. Otsu, "A threshold selection method from gray-level histograms",
014 * IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics 9(1), 62-66 (1979).
015 */
016public class OtsuThresholder extends GlobalThresholder {
017        
018        private int[] h = null;
019        private double[] M0 = null;             // table of background means
020        private double[] M1 = null;             // table of foreground means
021        private int N = 0;                              // number of image pixels
022        
023        public OtsuThresholder() {
024                super();
025        }
026        
027        public int getThreshold(int[] hist) {
028                h = hist;
029                int K = h.length;
030                makeMeanTables(h);
031
032                double sigma2Bmax = 0;
033                int qMax = -1;
034                int n0 = 0;
035                
036                // examine all possible threshold values q:
037                for (int q = 0; q <= K-2; q++) {
038                        n0 = n0 +  h[q]; 
039                        int n1 = N - n0;
040                        if (n0 > 0 && n1 > 0) {
041                                double meanDiff = M0[q] - M1[q];
042                                double sigma2B =  meanDiff * meanDiff * n0 * n1; // (1/N^2) has been omitted
043                                if (sigma2B > sigma2Bmax) {
044                                        sigma2Bmax = sigma2B;
045                                        qMax = q;
046                                }
047                        }
048                }
049                
050                return qMax;
051        }
052        
053        private void makeMeanTables(int[] h) {
054                int K = h.length;
055                this.M0 = new double[K];
056                this.M1 = new double[K];
057                int n0 = 0;
058                long s0 = 0;
059                for (int q = 0; q < K; q++) {
060                        n0 = n0 + h[q];
061                        s0 = s0 + q * h[q];
062                        M0[q] = (n0 > 0) ? ((double) s0)/n0 : -1;
063                }
064                
065                this.N = n0;
066                
067                int n1 = 0;
068                long s1 = 0;
069                M1[K-1] = 0;
070                for (int q = h.length-2; q >= 0; q--) {
071                        n1 = n1 + h[q+1];
072                        s1 = s1 + (q+1) * h[q+1];
073                        M1[q] = (n1 > 0) ? ((double) s1)/n1 : -1;
074                }
075                
076//              return N;
077        }
078}
